long_description: Perfect for the beginner, this entry-level model incorporates many of the features usually found only on more advanced models. Nearly silent blade shape enters and exits water cleanly. Carefully engineered lightweight, injection-molded nylon and fiberglass blade design helps you paddle longer with less fatigue. Dihedral curve and asymmetrical power face eliminate blade flutter; thin and low-profile to reduce wind resistance. Blade surface area is distributed evenly for a balanced feel, uniform pull and minimal roll. Lightweight, strong aluminum shaft has 3M Versafit(TM) over the oval grip area for comfortable and confident hand control. Composite ferrule is extremely light and strong; tested to ensure great fit, feathering angle, breakdown ease and joint tightness. Feathering is adjustable to 0 or 60 degrees, with left or right hand control. Comes with heavy-duty rubber drip rings.
short_description: Perfect for the beginner, this entry-level model incorporates many of the features usually found only on more advanced models.
